content.value_statement: You need a starting point for a skill file. This template gives you a minimal SKILL.md structure to edit.
actual_capabilities: Defines a skill name in YAML front matter
Provides a Markdown section for instructions
Serves as a minimal single file skill scaffold
limitations: No scripts or automation are provided
No tests or examples are included

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude and Codex?
faq.answer: Yes, it is a plain SKILL.md template that both platforms can read.

faq.question: Are there usage limits?
faq.answer: There are no built in limits because the file only contains text.

faq.question: Can I integrate it with tools?
faq.answer: Not directly. You must add tool instructions in the SKILL.md section.

faq.question: Does it handle sensitive data safely?
faq.answer: It does not process data, so data safety depends on your edits.

faq.question: What if the skill does not trigger?
faq.answer: Update the description to clearly state when the skill should apply.

faq.question: How does it compare to a full skill?
faq.answer: It is only a starting scaffold, not a complete workflow.
